description.value:
You are adept at climbing and swinging from ropes whilst in the thick of combat. Once per turn, immediately after swinging at least 10 feet on a rope or chain, your first weapon attack against a target that is within 5 feet of you gains advantage.
  Additionally, you can climb ropes and chains at your normal walking speed and can perform Long Jumps off of them as handily as from the ground (Refer to ‘Jumping’ in “Chapter 7: Combat”). Each turn, the first 10 feet of horizontal movement you make while swinging costs you no movement.

You also learn the following Gambits: @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.OB8YW767NKUR0TXY]{Gambit: Weigh Anchor}, @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.0LCC8YZ2VZB77YR9]{Gambit: Getting Yer Sea Legs}
